select #{statdate} stat_date,op.city_code,o.order_no,op.park_id,op.parkrecord_id, op.plate_no,o.pay_type,'1' order_type,ifnull(o.price,0) price,'' refund_no,0 refund_fee, op.berth_code,p.name park_name,op.arrival_time arrive_time,op.departure_time,p.park_type, now() refund_time,'' error_desc from app_order o left join app_order_parkrecord op on op.order_no = o.order_no left join app_park p on op.park_id = p.id where o.order_time between STR_TO_DATE('${startTime}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and STR_TO_DATE('${endTime}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and order_status = #{orderStatus} union select #{statdate} stat_date,op.city_code,o.order_no,op.park_id,op.parkrecord_id, op.plate_no,od.pay_type,'2' order_type,0 price,o.refund_no,ifnull(o.refund_fee,0) refund_fee, op.berth_code,p.name park_name,op.arrival_time arrive_time,op.departure_time,p.park_type, o.refund_time,CONCAT(o.order_no,'订单于',o.refund_time ,'退费',o.refund_fee,'，退费订单号：',o.refund_no) error_desc from app_order_refund o left join app_order_parkrecord op on op.order_no = o.order_no left join app_park p on op.park_id = p.id left join app_order od on od.order_no = o.order_no where o.refund_time between STR_TO_DATE('${startTime}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and STR_TO_DATE('${endTime}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and order_status = #{orderStatus} order by order_no

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into fanc_order_spms (id, stat_date, city_code, order_no, park_id, parkrecord_id, plate_no, pay_type, order_type, price, refund_no, refund_fee, berth_code, park_name,park_durations,arrive_time, departure_time,exception_type, park_type,error_type,error_desc,is_white) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.statDate}, #{item.cityCode}, #{item.orderNo}, #{item.parkId}, #{item.parkrecordId}, #{item.plateNo}, #{item.payType}, #{item.orderType}, #{item.price}, #{item.refundNo}, #{item.refundFee}, #{item.berthCode}, #{item.parkName}, #{item.parkDurations}, #{item.arriveTime}, #{item.departureTime}, #{item.exceptionType}, #{item.parkType}, #{item.errorType}, #{item.errorDesc}, #{item.isWhite})
mapper.select: select * from (select op.city_code,o.order_no,op.park_id,op.parkrecord_id, op.plate_no,o.pay_type,'1' order_type,ifnull(o.price,0) price,'' refund_no,0 refund_fee, op.berth_code,p.name park_name,op.arrival_time arrive_time,op.departure_time,p.park_type from app_order o left join app_order_parkrecord op on op.order_no = o.order_no left join app_park p on op.park_id = p.id where o.order_no = #{orderNo} union select op.city_code,o.order_no,op.park_id,op.parkrecord_id, op.plate_no,od.pay_type,'2' order_type,0 price,o.refund_no,sum(ifnull(o.refund_fee,0)) refund_fee, op.berth_code,p.name park_name,op.arrival_time arrive_time,op.departure_time,p.park_type from app_order_refund o left join app_order_parkrecord op on op.order_no = o.order_no left join app_park p on op.park_id = p.id left join app_order od on od.order_no = o.order_no where o.order_no = #{orderNo}) t where t.order_type = #{orderType}

select count(count) from (SELECT count(t.city_code) count FROM fanc_order_spms t LEFT JOIN base_area ba ON ba.AREA_CODE = t.city_code WHERE 1=1
and t.stat_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE('${summaryMonthStart}','%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE('${summaryMonthEnd}','%Y-%m-%d')
and ba.id = #{cityCode}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.stat_date,'%Y-%m'),t.city_code) t

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(fos.stat_date,'%Y-%m') summaryMonth, fos.stat_date, fos.city_code, ifnull(ba.area_name,'') area_name, fos.order_type, fos.pay_type, fos.exception_type, SUM(IFNULL(fos.PRICE,0)) price, SUM(IFNULL(fos.refund_fee,0)) refundFee, SUM(IFNULL(aop.REDBOX_FEE,0)+IFNULL(aop.TICKET_FEE,0)+IFNULL(aop.DISCOUNT_FEE,0)) discountPrice, SUM(IFNULL(ros.price,0)) priceSpms, SUM(IFNULL(ros.refund_fee,0)) refundFeeSpms FROM fanc_order_spms fos LEFT JOIN app_order_paylog aop ON aop.ORDER_NO = fos.order_no LEFT JOIN rca_order_spms ros ON ros.order_no = fos.order_no AND ros.order_type=fos.order_type LEFT JOIN base_area ba ON ba.AREA_CODE = fos.city_code WHERE 1=1
and fos.stat_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE('${summaryMonthStart}','%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE('${summaryMonthEnd}','%Y-%m-%d')
and ba.id = #{cityCode}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(fos.stat_date,'%Y-%m'),fos.city_code,fos.order_type,fos.pay_type,fos.exception_type
